entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:04 PM CST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:04 PM CST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
